description: These easy apple turnovers are ready in just 30 minutes. Serve them with whipped cream and icing sugar on top.
name: Apple Turnover with whipped cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice along the sealed pastry fill with whipped cream, dust with icing sugar and serve.
